metadata.dcterms:title: Trace element data for inclusions in diamond
metadata.dcterms:creator: Stachel, Thomas
metadata.dcterms:description: Database of major and trace element compositions of mineral inclusions in diamond, combined with physical, IR-spectroscopic and stable isotopic characteristics of their host diamonds
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
